      • searchFood

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> searchFood(java.lang.String food)
        This method takes a food name and search it in the database, and return data
        Parameters:
        food - a food name(can have more than one ingredients)
        Returns:
        result a 2D arraylist(String) that stores the data of a given food

      • getQuality

        public static float[] getQuality(java.lang.String name)
        This method takes a food name and return the energy, sodium, fatty data
        Parameters:
        name - a food name(can have more than one ingredients)
        Returns:
        quality float[3] that stores the data of a given food in this order: energy, sodium, fatty

      • createMenuText

        public static boolean createMenuText(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String txt)
        This method insert row(s) into the database, with a user ID and the name of the foods in the menu
        Parameters:
        id - a user ID
        txt - a food name(can have more than one ingredients)
        Returns:
        boolean whether the insert is success or not

      • createMenuJson

        public static boolean createMenuJson(java.lang.String id,
                                     java.lang.String txt)
        This method insert menu of json type into the database, with a user ID and the name of the foods in the menu
        Parameters:
        id - a user ID
        txt - a url string that refers to the Json file
        Returns:
        boolean whether the insert is success or not

      • createMenuImage

                                      java.net.URI uri)
        This method insert menu of image type into the database, with a user ID and the name of the foods in the menu
        Parameters:
        id - a user ID
        uri - a URI object that refers to the Image file
        Returns:
        boolean whether the insert is success or not
